codes.CONR: Creditor agent claims non-receipt of cover or settlement.
codes.PINC: Payment initiation has not been settled or confirmed.
codes.RQCH: Investigation relating to charges that have been taken or are requested.
codes.RQDA: Debit authorisation on an entry is requested.
codes.RQFI: Further information is required on a payment, entry, message or instruction.
codes.RQUF: Use of funds on an entry is requested.
codes.RQVA: Revaluation of an entry is requested.
codes.UTAP: A booked entry cannot be applied by the creditor.

description: Specifies the investigation type, as published in an external investigation type code set.
name: ExternalInvestigationType1Code
